title: Sovereign AGI Policy Parameter Schema Catalog
description: Defines standardized JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 definitions for configuration parameters used across AGI policy modules, utilizing external type definitions for modularity and reduced duplication.

schemas.description: Collection of policy configuration schemas, indexed by policy identifier (e.g., module.subsystem.name).

module_version.description: The semantic version of the corresponding implementation module.

description.description: Contextual description of what these parameters configure.

definition.description: The standard JSON Schema 2020-12 definition for policy parameters.

core.algorithms.risk.contextual_modulato.description: Schema for CVM V3 risk adjustment algorithm parameters.

max_shift_magnitude.description: Maximum allowable relative shift in the governance threshold.

override_conditions.description: Conditions that trigger a parameterized override.
